title: Avalara | SDE2 | Remote
content:
Education: B.Tech Tier 2 College
Years of Experience: 2.2 years
Prior Experience: SDE MNC
Current CTC :- 21 L
Experience: Java spring boot
Date of the Offer: 22 October 2024
Company: Avalara
Title/Level: SDE2
Location: Permanent Remote
Salary: 26L
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 4L
Stock bonus: 0
Bonus: Variable pay 5% of salary ie 1.3L
Total comp: 31.3L
Benefits: Standard
Other details: People going to office have free breakfast and lunch, gym + internet reimbursement, some other quarterly Rs. 8k benefits
